name: butterhead
content:

a type of lettuce (= green salad vegetable) with soft, round leaves and a sweet flavour: Butterhead has more loosely furled leaves than crisphead. Serve with a mustard dressing and some shredded butterhead lettuce. Synonym
butter lettuce
More examplesFewer examplesButterheads, romaines, and crispheads should be harvested when the head begins to form.Lettuce, particularly the butterhead varieties, is not difficult to grow. I remember when people used to drench butterhead leaves in large blobs of salad cream.
